title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
summary: The second installment of the epic saga, where the divided fellowship battles to protect Middle-earth from Saruman's armies.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
summary: The thrilling conclusion of the trilogy, where the final battle against Sauron unfolds as Frodo nears Mount Doom.

title: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope
summary: The beginning of the iconic space saga, where Luke Skywalker joins the Rebel Alliance to fight the Galactic Empire.

title: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back
summary: The Rebels face setbacks as Darth Vader hunts them, and Luke begins his Jedi training under Yoda.

title: Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi
summary: The Rebel Alliance mounts a final attack on the Empire while Luke confronts Darth Vader to save his father.
